summary: The Pump Configuration and Control cluster provides an interface for the setup and control of pump devices, and the automatic reporting of pump status information. Note that control of pump speed is not included – speed is controlled by the On/Off and Level Control clusters.

dependencies.description: Used by a pump device to turn it on and off and control its setpoint

dependencies.cluster: Pressure Measurement, Flow Measurement, Temperature Measurement
dependencies.description: Client clusters used for connection to remote sensor devices for external measurements

0.name: ConstantPressure
0.summary: Supports operating in constant pressure mode

1.name: CompensatedPressure
1.summary: Supports operating in compensated pressure mode

2.name: ConstantFlow
2.summary: Supports operating in constant flow mode

3.name: ConstantSpeed
3.summary: Supports operating in constant speed mode

4.name: ConstantTemperature
4.summary: Supports operating in constant temperature mode

bits.0: DeviceFault - A fault related to the system or pump device is detected
bits.1: SupplyFault - A fault related to the supply to the pump is detected
bits.2: SpeedLow - Setpoint is too low to achieve
bits.3: SpeedHigh - Setpoint is too high to achieve
bits.4: LocalOverride - Device control is overridden by hardware
bits.6: RemotePressure - A remote pressure sensor is used for regulation
bits.7: RemoteFlow - A remote flow sensor is used for regulation
bits.8: RemoteTemperature - A remote temperature sensor is used for regulation

values.0: Normal - The pump is controlled by a setpoint
values.1: Minimum - Run at minimum possible speed
values.2: Maximum - Run at maximum possible speed

values.1: ConstantPressure - Regulate speed to maintain constant differential pressure
values.2: ProportionalPressure - Regulate speed to maintain constant differential pressure (compensated)
values.3: ConstantFlow - Regulate speed to maintain constant flow
values.5: ConstantTemperature - Regulate speed to maintain constant temperature

0x0000.name: MaxPressure
0x0000.description: Maximum pressure the pump can achieve (-3,276.7 to 3,276.7 kPa, steps of 0.1 kPa)

0x0001.name: MaxSpeed
0x0001.description: Maximum speed the pump can achieve (0 to 65,534 RPM, steps of 1 RPM)

0x0002.name: MaxFlow
0x0002.description: Maximum flow the pump can achieve (0 to 6,553.4 m³/h, steps of 0.1 m³/h)

0x0010.name: PumpStatus
0x0010.description: Activity status of the pump functions

0x0011.name: EffectiveOperationMode
0x0011.description: Current effective operation mode of the pump

0x0012.name: EffectiveControlMode
0x0012.description: Current effective control mode of the pump

revision_history.description: New data model format and notation, added additional events
